required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Functional Outcome of Urethral Reconstructive Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Long-term Single Center Cohort Study Assessing Functional Outcome of Urethral Reconstructive Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: The analysis of the long-term outcomes and quality-of-life parameters after urethral reconstruction surgery.

detailed_description.textblock:
Urethroplasty is the surgical repair of a urethral stricture. Depending on the location, severity and length of the stricture, various techniques can be performed.
The first procedure consists of the excision of the stenotic segment and end-to-end anastomosis. Other procedures consist of widening the urethra with buccal mucosa as free graft or with vascularized (genital) skin flaps. The results of these techniques have been described in prospective cohort studies, but to date there is little good data about the functional outcome and quality-of-life with longer follow-up after this surgery.
The purpose of this study is to prospectively follow patients for functional outcome parameters and quality-of-life to obtain long-term information concerning these surgeries.

primary_outcome.measure: Quality Of Life: change from baseline (=preoperative value)
primary_outcome.description: Validated questionnaires (patient reported outcome measures) concerning general discomfort, micturition problems, erections, and the impact of those problems on their social life. International Prostate Symptom Score - Quality of Life questionnaire (IPSS-QOL) International Consultation of Incontinence - Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms Quality of Life questionnaire (ICIQ-LUTSQoL)

secondary_outcome.measure: Functional outcomes: micturition: change from baseline (=preoperative value)
secondary_outcome.description: Validated questionnaires International Consultation of Incontinence - Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms Quality of Life questionnaire (ICIQ-LUTSQoL) Urogenital Distress Inventory short form (UDI-6)

secondary_outcome.measure: Functional outcomes: erection: change from baseline (=preoperative value)
secondary_outcome.description: Validated questionnaires * International Index of Erectile Dysfunction (IIEF)

arm_group.description: patients requiring surgery for urethral stricture

study_pop.textblock: All patients who underwent urethral reconstruction in our center from 2009 to this date

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- male
- urethral stricture surgery
- informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- /
